name: Potato Chip Simulator
description:
This game was made as a Big/ Little project for the Phi Tau chapter of Mu Phi Epsilon at the University of North Texas.

It is a short story-led experience, and all of the proceeds from it's release date (April 9th, 2017) to a year later (April 9th, 2018) will be given to The Shropshire Foundation. After April 9th, 2018, the game will become free-of-charge.

There are 8 endings to find in this ridiculous, hilarious, adorable story. Things get crazy. Things get weird. Things get salty. Please try this out (it's going towards a good cause!)
